channel.title: [delta]smihthing interface[delta]
channel.description:
well,
i added that when u use a rune bar on an anvil and u have a hammer that the smithing interface will open. But there only stands, dagger 1bar but no picture or something i can click one. Can someone help me with adding pictures to it so i can make that dagger? i'm using a delta base.
pic. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/29geakj.jpg[/img]
